testcase.name: Verify cancel checkout action
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cancel checkout action Given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 5.160s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.066s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.205s And User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.199s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.195s And User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.197s Then Verify user should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.006s When User clicks cancel on checkout overview page ... passed in 1.225s Then Verify user navigates to the cart page ... passed in 0.008s And Verify cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify error on empty checkout fields
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify error on empty checkout fields Given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 5.147s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.063s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.219s And User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.217s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.199s And User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.228s Then Verify user should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.005s When User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.222s Then User clicks continue from checkout overview page ... passed in 1.218s And Verify 'Error: Last Name is required' should be displayed ... passed in 0.014s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
